Content: Practice chanters are used by beginners to learn techniques for fingering and blowing. Because pipers need to know their tunes from memory, practice chanters are also used when learning any new tune. Pipe band members practice together using practice chanters, both for practicing old tunes and for learning the tempo and notes to new music.
Source: Highland Bagpipe Tutor Student Manual, 4th edition
Author: Dr. Peter L. Heineman
